name: Stars and Empires: Colony Defense
storyline:
You start out on your own as a colonist working for the Solarian Federation to help establish logistics and manage construction in the outer reaches of the Federations territory. Many rouge factions are at war out here and the native wildlife can be vicious. It will take everything you have to make sure you solidify your claim on these new worlds and help push the boundaries of the Federations controlled region in space.

Challenge the elements and colonize all of the points of interest in the star system to help the Federation solidify their claim in this region of space and build up the frontier.
summary: An RTS/Action 3rd person shooter that forces players to defend their base against waves of unknown threats of all kinds. Use strategy, unique abilities, tech research and combat skills to hold off any invaders.
